news.description: The Rift closes in less than 24h! Today is your last chance to get Tome IV rewards.
news.title: Archives | 24h left to Tome IV

news.description:
The Rift for Tome IV will close on October 7th!

For those without a Rift Pass, this will be the last chance to unlock it and claim any rewards you've earned on the Premium track.

Once the Rift closes the below will come into effect:
  • Challenges, Entries, and Bloodpoints from Tome IV will remain available permanently after this date but no longer award Rift Fragments. Once the next Tome begins, Tome IV will be available in the Compendium section.
  • Player Level XP will stop awarding Rift Fragments.
  • Unclaimed rewards from the Rift will be automatically claimed on your next launch of the game or tally screen, whichever comes first.


    • Stay tuned for Tome V to arrive with Mid-Chapter 17.5!
news.title: RIFT CLOSES IN 1 WEEK

news.description:
Cybil found more than she bargained for when she ventured into the fog and the terror that is Silent Hill.

Now available in the store:
  • Cheryl Mason - Cybil Bennett

    • Check out the Collection Trailer here.
news.title: <u>SILENT HILL LEGENDS COLLECTION</u>

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 4.2.2 bugfix.

KEY CHANGES:
  • Fixed an issue that may cause hooking survivors, breaking pallets and damaging generators to stop shortly after pressing the input
  • Fixed an issue that may cause movement stutters due to network latency
  • Fixed an issue that caused stun durations to be inconsistent across killers


    • Please see HERE for detailed patch notes.
news.title: 4.2.2 BUGFIX

news.description:
Level IV of Tome IV is now available! With it comes the below:
  • 20 Challenges (incl. 8 Master Challenges)
  • 8 Memory and Log Entries (including the final entry for The Wraith's "The Algebra of Infinite Night")
  • More Bloodpoints


    • To access Level IV, you must have reached the Epilogue node of Level III with either role.
news.title: WRAITH'S "ALGEBRA OF INFINITE NIGHT"

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 4.2.1 bugfix.

KEY CHANGES:
  • Fixed an issue that caused the "heartbeat" sound played for Survivors in the Terror Radius to be much quieter than intended.
  • Fixed a number of issues that caused the Huntress' hatchets to have incorrect behavior when server-side hit validation is enabled.
  • Fixed an issue that caused Survivors hooked in the basement to appear floating in the air in the floor above the basement.


    • Please see HERE for detailed patch notes.
news.title: 4.2.1 BUGFIX

news.description:
Oktoberfest is a time of celebration and friendship. Enjoy the good times while they last, the Entity is never far behind.

Now available in the store:
  • Felix Richter - Ancestral Roots
  • Meg Thomas - Oktober Enchantment
  • Kate Denson - Lady Volksfest

    • Check out the Collection Trailer here.
news.title: <u>OKTOBERFEST COLLECTION</u>

news.description:
Let ambition drive you... but tread carefully: the line between ambition and hubris is razor thin. Talbot Grimes - The Blight - was once a bright and ambitious chemist who sought to enhance humanity through the use of his compounds, only to become a victim of his own ambitions. After his research was stolen, The Blight was lured into the Realm of the Entity by the promise of new, forbidden knowledge.

The new Survivor is Felix Richter, an eccentric architect with a unique vision. Returning to the mysterious island where his father had disappeared, Felix descended into the darkness beyond and was never seen again.

The Descend Beyond Chapter includes:
  • A new Killer: The Blight
  • A new Survivor: Felix Richter
  • An exclusive item for Felix


    • Experience the corruption of The Blight, and the ambitious spirit of Felix Richter with the Descend Beyond Chapter.

    Please note that there will be a delay between the Descend Beyond characters being available via our in-game store and the full DLC package. Should you purchase a single character via our store; you will not receive the DLC exclusive item. We also remind you that in-game store purchases are non-refundable.
news.title: Descend Beyond Chapter Release

news.description:
Just behind the veil of the thick fog, the Blight is waiting for his victim, dressed to kill.

Now available in the store:
  • Felix Richter - Larger Than Life
  • The Blight - Sophisticated Slaughter

    • Check out the Collection Trailer here.
news.title: <u>FREE SPIRIT & GENTLEMAN HORROR</u>

news.description:
Welcome to Chapter 17! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you'll find during this update

For a full list of patch notes, click HERE.

NEW CHAPTER
  • Added new characters: The Blight (Killer) and Felix Richter (Survivor)


    • FEATURES & CONTENT
  • Visual updates of common in-game objects: Generators, Pallets, Lockers, and Chests
  • Visual updates & breakable walls added to some realms: Springwood & Yamaoka Estate
  • Appearance rate of these realms is increased for the first week of release
  • Added new Offerings affecting Realm, Basement, and Hatch spawns
news.title: CHAPTER 17 PATCH NOTES

news.description:
We've now increased the Tick Rate of the game from 30 to 60 per second.
  • Players positions in-game will be communicated with the server twice as often, providing more accurate hits for a fairer gameplay experience.
news.title: INCREASED TICK RATE

news.title: MEG'S "EAT DUST"

news.description: As a thank you for your continued support and patience while we troubleshoot error codes 111 & 112, log in now for 250k Bloodpoints! These Bloodpoints will have been automatically added after you logged in.
news.title: FREE BLOODPOINTS

news.description: We have activated the Hit Validation Beta on the live version of the game. This feature aims to greatly reduce abnormal hits during gameplay. For more details on how this system works, click here.
news.title: Hit Validation Beta

news.description:
The Executioner knows your mind well. He does not hide in the shadows. He's closer than you think.

Available now:
  • The Executioner - Forge Born Set

    • Watch the trailer here!
news.title: IMMOLATION COLLECTION

news.description:
The 4.1.3 Bugfix Patch is now live on Steam. This patch includes fixes for sync errors (Error Codes 111 & 112).
While running version 4.1.3, you will still be able to cross-play with people running version 4.1.2 of the game on other platforms.

This hotfix has implemented a method to greatly reduce the occurrence of Sync Error 112. However, if this problem is still occurring for you, please reach out to Customer Support to help us continue investigating the issue.
news.title: STEAM 4.1.3 HOTFIX

news.description:
Cross-Play and Cross-Friends have now arrived in Dead by Daylight!

With both of these active, you can now add friends from across Steam, Windows Store, Xbox One, PS4, and Switch platforms. Players from all these platforms can now appear in your Trials...you never know who will show up when you're surviving together (or killing) online in the Fog!

Players who wish to keep matchmaking locked to their own platform will be able to opt-out of Cross-Play.
news.title: CROSS-PLAY & CROSS-FRIENDS

news.description:
With regards to Error 111/112, we apologize that this error is still affecting our players and can assure you it is receiving our attention.

The team is working on finding a solution as a matter of urgency. We have tried to implement a quick fix with our most recent patch, but this didn't pan out as we had hoped.

Unfortunately, this does mean we won't be able to fix this for you today. We do not yet have an ETA to share as to when this issue will be resolved.

We know these errors are incredibly frustrating, but rest assured the team are putting all their effort into finding a solution.

Apologies for the situation, and thank you for your patience.
news.title: ERROR 111/112 INFORMATION

news.description:
The Archives returns with a new Tome, CONVICTION, containing new Challenges, new stories, and new rewards. Explore the memories of The Wraith, Meg Thomas, The Hag, and Ace Visconti while earning memorable outfits and cosmetics.

Dive deeper into Tome IV's characters with the Tome Trailer & Rift Trailer.

Level Release Schedule
  • Level I: July 29th 2020
  • Level II: August 12th 2020
  • Level III: August 26th 2020
  • Level IV: September 16th 2020


    • Please note these release dates are subject to change. All Previously unlocked levels will remain available once released but will stop providing Rift Fragments once the relevant Rift has expired.

    LIMITED TIME SALE
    30% off the below featured characters for Tome IV
  • Ace Visconti - 350 AC (was 500)
  • The Hag - 350 AC (was 500)


    • Discount ends August 5th
news.title: Archive Tome IV - CONVICTION

news.title: GREEK LEGENDS COLLECTION

news.description:
For complete list of changes and bug fixes please visit forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes

FEATURES
  • Added a Promo Code System to the Store

    • BALANCE
    The Cannibal:
    Power Changes
    Added Chainsaw Sweep charges. Using the Chainsaw will consume a charge and trigger a Chainsaw Sweep. During this time, The Cannibal can extend the Chainsaw Sweep by pressing the power button before the power bar fully depletes. The more charges are used, the longer the miss cooldown / tantrum (if colliding with obstacles).

    Furthermore, if The Cannibal revs the chainsaw for too long, a tantrum is automatically triggered for the base duration of 5 seconds.

    When a tantrum is triggered, all remaining charges are consumed. The tantrum meter will pause as soon as the power button is released and will start going down when the chainsaw is put away.

    Add-ons: Updated most of his add-ons.

    The Hillbilly:
    Power Changes
    Added the overheat mechanic. Using the chainsaw will now build up heat. When reaching the maximum amount of heat, the chainsaw overheats and cannot be used until it has cooled off. If the heat meter fills up, the chainsaw overheats. If the chainsaw overheats during a chainsaw sprint:
  • The sprint is not interrupted
  • The chainsaw goes through the cooldown phase after the sprint has ended


    • The heat meter will pause as soon as the power button is released and will start going down when the chainsaw is put away. Furthermore, the heat meter does not progress during The Hillbilly's various cooldown phases. This includes a chainsaw miss, a chainsaw hit and colliding with an obstacle.
    Add-ons: Updated most of his add-ons.

    Perk Updates
  • Franklin's Demise: Instead of the item losing charges when dropped, the Entity will consume the item after 150/120/90 seconds if it is not picked up. Additionally, Franklin's Demise will reveal the aura of items on the ground within 32/32/32 meters
  • Knock Out: Now triggers on basic attacks only. Additionally, Survivors put in the dying state by your basic attacks will crawl 50/50/50% slower for 15/15/15 seconds. During this time, they are affected by the Blindness status effect.
  • Lightborn: Grants immunity to blindness caused by flashlights and firecrackers. Survivors that attempt blinding you have their aura revealed for 6/8/10 seconds.
  • Tinkerer: Now triggers at 70/70/70% (down from 85%) and grants the Undetectable status effect for 12/14/16 seconds (up from 8/10/12)

    • BUG FIXES
    Various bug fixes. For complete list please visit forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes
news.title: 4.1.0 Patch Notes
